src:
Penggawa Arema Siap Bangkit Kala Menghadapi Madura United
07 Nov 2019, 17:58 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Para penggawa Arema FC dipastikan bakal bermain dengan motivasi lebih pada laga lanjutan Shopee Liga 1 musim 2019, kontra Madura United. Mereka dipastikan sudah bangkit setelah menelan kekalahan dari Badak Lampung pada laga sebelumnya.
"Kami sudah melupakan kekalahan menyakitkan pada pertandingan lawan Badak Lampung," kata penyerang Arema, Ahmad Nur Hardianto.
"Kami pun sudah menyiapkan diri sebaik mungkin jelang pertandingan lawan Madura United," sambungnya.
Menurut Dian, sapaan karib Hardianto, timnya bakal bermain sebaik mungkin pada laga kontra Madura United. Pasalnya, mereka memiliki target tinggi, yang harus bisa diraih pada pertandingan lawan Madura United.
"Kami bertekad meraih kemenangan pada pertandingan ini," tuturnya.
Arema akan menghadapi Madura United pada laga pekan ke-27 Shopee Liga 1 musim 2019. Pertandingan, yang akan disiarkan langsung Indosiar, ini akan dihelat di Stadion Kanjuruhan Kabupaten Malang, Jumat (08/11).
Saat ini, Arema berada di peringkat enam klasemen sementara dengan raihan 38 poin dari 25 laga. Sementara, Madura United berada di posisi dua, dengan koleksi 44 angka dari 26 pertandingan.

Apakah tekad meraih kemenangan menjadi sebuah tekanan bagi para penggawa Arema? Simak di bawah ini.
text:
Penggawa Arema Ready to Revive When Facing Madura United
Nov 7 2019, 17:58 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Arema FC players will certainly be playing with more motivation in the continued match of Shopee Liga 1 in 2019, contra Madura United. They certainly have risen after swallowing the defeat of the Lampung rhino in the previous fight.
"We have forgotten the painful defeat in the match against the Lampung Rhinos," said Arema striker Ahmad Nur Hardianto.
"We also have prepared ourselves as best as possible ahead of the match against Madura United," he continued.
According to Dian, Hardianto's best friend, his team will play their best in the game against Madura United. Because, they have a high target, which must be achieved in the match against Madura United.
"We are determined to win this match," he said.
Arema will face Madura United in the 27th match of Shopee Liga 1 season 2019. The match, which will be broadcast live Indosiar, will be held at the Kanjempuan Stadium in Malang Regency, Friday (11/08).
Currently, Arema is ranked sixth in the standings with 38 points from 25 matches. Meanwhile, Madura United is in second position, with a collection of 44 points from 26 matches.

Is the determination to win a pressure for the Arema penggawa? See below.
